attachments.displayName:
THANK YOU EVERYONE FOR 1k Followers! <3
What should I do? UNFORTUNATELY... I can't do the challenge video since... my mother would pressure me into telling everything I'm doing and why I have to do challenges.... anyways, stay tuned, I will think of something. I can't do AMVs since I dont have the correct program for it, I have Imovie but it SUCKS at editing, and my mom blocks me from downloading things on my computer.. T_T
PLEASE COMMENT BELOW WHAT YOU WOULD LIKE TO DO CELEBRATE! <3 Ah... and I can't do events...... I don't have time and the only time I am on here is during school.. gomenasai minna for so many... inconveniences... (_ _)
